entry.title: $2400 // Immaculate Place to Call Home!
entry.content:
Historical Brownstone living with 4 windows Overlooking a tree-lined block and skyline views! Enter the building through original French doors step into an immaculate hallway with original ornate details.
The kitchen has an entire wall of exposed brick, Breakfast Knook, tastefully tiled, pantry and tin ceilings. The living/ dining boast an abundance of sunshine all day. The KING size bedroom is loaded with detail including window shutters, tin ceilings, polished wood floors along with chic lighting. There's a large updated full bathroom.
3.5 blocks to F/G at Carroll St Station, steps to the weekend farmers market on Carroll St, citibike at the corner, many great restaurants, cafes & shops! EASY location to call home. NO BIKES & NO PETS please Brokers fee
